jobDescription: Founded in 1946, Knowles Corporation (NYSE: KN) is a market leader and global supplier of advanced micro-acoustic solutions serving the mobile communications, consumer electronics, medical technology, military, aerospace and industrial markets. In Knowles’ Intelligent Audio division we complement the leading position in micro-acoustic transducers with deep expertise in audio and sensor processing, machine intelligence algorithms and the development of low-power DSPs to enable cutting-edge audio capabilities in smartphones, tablets and other consumer and medical devices.  Job Description:  This individual will join a dynamic team to collect and validate the data for the most advanced signal processing solutions in telecommunications.  Responsibilities: Audio and multi-sensory data collectionData validationWrite or modify functions and scripts in MatlabExcellent verbal and written communication skillsHighly detail oriented and well organizedGood interpersonal and team working skills Experience, Skill and Education Required Candidates that are pursuing a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Information Systems or an equivalent degreeAbility to coordinate and schedule participants for data collectionExposure to MatlabProficiency in Excel
